title: Mordecai and Joe have been SOLD
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Mordecai and Joe have been SOLD
posts.post_content:
SOLDLower grade Cub HOFers kick off the new year hoping for a trip to the Post Office.

Both cards are the desirable portraits in undesirable condition.

Mordecai resides in an SGC 10 slab which does not hide the paper loss on the reverse.  The image is nice though giving the appearance of a higher grade from the front.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10035/brown-m-portrait[/IMG]

Similarly Joe resides in a BVG 1 slab with some of the same maladies.  Like Mordecai though the image is compatible with a much higher grade.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/18733/tinker-portrait[/IMG]

These cards would display very nicely in Cub wall display.  If you are a front collector looking for aesthetically pleasing HOF portraits, this listing is for you.

I am asking $66 each for these cards including shipping, or $130 for the pair.

All payments are net to me by any means available to you, but I will not return the pigeon if that is your choice.  If you want them cracked out of the slabs, I will offer that service at no additional charge.
